heroTagline: Taste & share food from all over the world.
howItWorksDesc1: NextLevel Food is a platform for foodies to share their favorite recipes with the world. It's a place to discover new dishes, and to connect with other food lovers.
howItWorksDesc2: NextLevel Food is a place to discover new dishes, and to connect with other food lovers.
